price: Na hata wange ona pande linatoka mbinguni linaanguka wange sema: Ni mawingu yaliyo bebana.
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
footnotes: Na wakiona kipande cha mbingu kinwaangukia kuwaadhibu wao husema, kwa inda tu: Ni mawingu yaliyo bebana!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samāi sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūmun
